visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a variable pie chart with the following specifications: Chart type is 'variablepie', chart title is 'zMin set to 5, smaller z values are treated as 5.', axes and labels styling includes a title font size of 18px and a label font size of 14px, data series includes the provided data with series names and values, custom colors are not specified, and additional configurations include a minimum point size of 100, inner size of 20%, and zMin set to 5.

title.text: zMin set to 5, smaller z values are treated as 5.

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a variable pie chart. The chart type is set to 'variablepie', and the title is 'zMin set to 5, smaller z values are treated as 5.'. The title font size is set to 18px, and the axis labels' font size is set to 14px. The data series includes seven data points with 'y' and 'z' values. Additional configurations include a minimum point size of 100, an inner size of 20%, and a zMin value of 5, which ensures that any z values less than 5 are treated as 5. This setup will create a visually appealing variable pie chart with the specified data and styling.
